description: Safety routing traffic around an area involved in public safety incident

description: The process of determining the priority of patients' treatments based on the severity of their condition
name: Triage patients

description: The process through which law enforcement systematically searches a building.
name: Building sweep

description: The processed through which first responders systematically assist in removing individuals from a building.
name: Building evacuation

description: During an incident involving hazards that can move (i.e. through the atmosphere, in the water, or over land), public safety often employees modeling techniques in order to make informed decisions concerning course of action and/or evacuation.
name: Hazard Modeling

description: Using social media to distribute information to the general public.

description: the act of assigning appropriate resources (emergency responders) to an incident, monitoring the response, relaying relevant information, and logging transactions associated with the emergency response.
name: dispatch
